channel.title: For like the 5th time can someone help me?
channel.description: is there any way to make my PI client and server useable by others but where they can join me? And using Hamatchi, do I have to Port Forward?

item.title: For like the 5th time can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Thanks guys, now im gonna take it for a test run on my laptop with another account and see what I get.

Read full topic

item.title: For like the 5th time can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @killermoe33 killermoe33
item.description:
@killermoe33 wrote:

in the client’s file search for client.java then inside client.java search for “server” then ull find something like “server =” so delete wats after the “=” only the ip and put yours for the client ur letting people use. and for yours put “127.0.0.1” or “0.0.0.0” or in the client.java search for the ip if u alredy no it or search for “127.0.0.1” or “0.0.0.0” then compile and it should work =) good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: For like the 5th time can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Hamachi doesn’t require portforwarding.

Change the IP that the client connects to in client.java and advertise your server.
